      //Scan dir

   <bRescanDir>
      //Rescan dir

   <bRemoveDir>
      //Borrar scan

   <iRoots sqlSelect>
      //SELECT * FROM scan_roots WHERE rootLabel != 'paka'

      //pathRoot

   <sFiles sqlSelect>
      //SELECT * FROM scan_all WHERE rootID = ?((iRoots selected.rootID)) AND ((1)) AND ((1)) AND ((1))

   <sFiles sqlExtraFilter>
      //

   <tExtenFilt sqlSelect>
      //SELECT extension , count(*) AS nFiles, ROUND (SUM(size)/1000000, 3) AS MB FROM scan_files WHERE rootID = ?((iRoots selected.rootID)) GROUP BY extension ORDER BY 0+nFiles DESC

   <tExtenFilt db totalRecordCount>
      //0

   <tExtenFilt db recordOffset>
      //0

   <tPathFilt sqlSelect>
      //SELECT pathFile , count(*) AS nFiles, ROUND (SUM(size)/1000000, 3) AS MB FROM scan_files WHERE rootID = ?((iRoots selected.rootID)) GROUP BY pathFile ORDER BY 0+nFiles DESC

   <tPathFilt db totalRecordCount>
      //0

   <tPathFilt db recordOffset>
      //0

   <tDateFilt sqlSelect>
      //SELECT substr(date,1,7) as mes , count(*) AS nFiles, ROUND (SUM(size)/1000000, 3) AS MB FROM scan_files WHERE rootID = ?((iRoots selected.rootID)) GROUP BY mes ORDER BY mes DESC

   <tDateFilt db totalRecordCount>
      //0

   <tDateFilt db recordOffset>
      //0

   <tSameBrowse sqlSelect>
      //SELECT COUNT(*) AS nFiles, ROUND (SUM(size)/1000000, 3) AS MB  , fileName , date , size FROM scan_files WHERE rootID = ?((iRoots selected.rootID)) GROUP BY ""  , fileName , date , size HAVING nFiles > 1 ORDER BY nFiles DESC

   <tSameBrowse db totalRecordCount>
      //0

   <tSameBrowse db recordOffset>
      //0

   <tDateFilt sqlExtraFilter>
